pages.text: The expanse of the Molten Hills biome has become a great place for the growth of Culafite Mushrooms, where they have grown to huge sizes and filled all open areas.$(br)Their stems can be harvested and crafted into decorative blocks, and you can get several Culafite Mushrooms from each part of the top.$(br)Culafite Shroomlight is an excellent source of illumination of dark corners of the world and will fit for decoration.
